ashah766.shapes

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • ashah766.shapes.Shape
      • ashah766.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    Creates a line object that is able to detect collision with other lines and be rendered to a PApplet window
    Version:
    10/5/18
    Author:
    Atharva Shah

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ashah766.shapes.Shape

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line()
        Creates a line from 0, 0 to 0, 0. May appear as a point if rendered on a PApplet

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double x2,
            double y2)
        Creates a line from x1, y1 to x2, y2
        Parameters:
        x1 - x-coordinate of first endpoint
        y1 - y-coordinate of first endpoint
        x2 - x-coordinate of second endpoint
        y2 - y-coordinate of second endpoint

      • getIntersection

        public double[] getIntersection()
        Used to find the intersection of Lines with different slopes (lines cannot be collinear)
        Returns:
        returns the intersection (x, y) in a double array

      • setPoint2

        public void setPoint2(double x2,
                      double y2)
        This function is normally used when the user drags and places the endpoint of a line in a PApplet window
        Parameters:
        x2 - sets the x-coordinate of the second endpoint
        y2 - sets the y-coordinate of the second endpoint

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet window)
        Function to draw the line to a window
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        window - a PApplet is necessary to render the Line. Make sure that the PApplet is NOT null
        Precondition:
        window != null

      • getLine

        public double[] getLine()

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        The intersects method can be used to find out if a Line intersects another Line
        Parameters:
        other - user must pass in a Line to check for intersection
        Returns:
        true if the lines intersect with one another, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        other != null

      • getBounds

        public Rectangle getBounds()
        Useful method to get a x and y components around the Line
        Specified by:
        getBounds in class Shape
        Returns:
        Rectangle object with dimensions that wrap around the line

      • translate

        public void translate(double x,
                      double y)
        Useful method for translating the entire line by x,y
        Specified by:
        translate in class Shape
        Parameters:
        x - translates the entire line x units right
        y - translates the entire line y units up (down when rendering on PApplet)
